mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, email, role, lastLoginTime, lastLoginIp) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{role}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{lastLoginIp})
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, role = #{role}, lastLoginTime = #{lastLoginTime}, lastLoginIp = #{lastLoginIp} where username = #{username}
